issue.title: [Python] Update deprecated pytest yield_fixture functions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13686](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13686). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
[Since pytest 3.0, fixture functions support the **yield** statement as a replacement for **yield_fixture**](https://docs.pytest.org/en/6.2.x/yieldfixture.html). When pytest is run for PyArrow the following deprecation warning is shown:

```Java

the pyarrow/tests/test_serialization.py:283: PytestDeprecationWarning: @pytest.yield_fixture is deprecated. Use @pytest.fixture instead; they are the same.
```
